Metadata.title: BIOTERIK PHARMA | Pharmaceutical Supplements with Indena Ingredients
Metadata.description: Science-backed supplements with Indena ingredients. Products created by a team of pharmacists using standardized extracts of the highest pharmaceutical quality. Proven efficacy. Transparent formulas.
Metadata.keywords: pharmaceutical supplements, Indena ingredients, standardized extracts, BIOTERIK, pharmacist-formulated, bioavailability
Metadata.ogTitle: BIOTERIK PHARMA | Pharmaceutical Supplements with Indena Ingredients
Metadata.ogDescription: Science-backed supplements with Indena ingredients. Trusted by healthcare professionals.

Hero.description: Products created by a team of pharmacists using standardized extracts of the highest pharmaceutical quality. Proven efficacy. Transparent formulas.

description1.text: We are a pharmaceutical company dedicated to creating supplements that actually work. Every product is formulated with standardized, pharmaceutical-grade ingredients sourced directly from <indena>Indena</indena> — a trusted European manufacturer of standardized botanical extracts.

description2.text: Unlike conventional supplement companies, our team consists of <pharmacists>qualified pharmacists</pharmacists> who understand pharmacokinetics, bioavailability, and clinical efficacy. We don't create products based on trends — we create them based on <research>research</research>.

Pillars.title: Our Pharmaceutical Approach
Pillars.subtitle: Four pillars that distinguish us from conventional supplement manufacturers

pillar1.title: Standardized Extracts
pillar1.description: Precisely quantified active compounds for consistent efficacy across every batch

pillar2.title: Scientific Foundation
pillar2.description: Every formulation is backed by peer-reviewed research and clinical data

pillar3.title: Optimal Bioavailability
pillar3.description: Enhanced absorption and utilization by the body for maximum therapeutic benefit

pillar4.title: Rigorous QA/QC
pillar4.description: Multiple testing stages ensure purity, potency, and safety at every step

Indena.quote: Global leader in standardized botanical extracts, setting the international standard for quality in plant-based pharmaceuticals.
Indena.description: Indena is a global leader in standardized botanical extracts. For over 100 years, they've set the international standard for quality in plant-based pharmaceuticals.

features.compound: Standardized to precise active compound specifications
features.purity: Third-party tested for purity and potency

Indena.note: Every BIOTERIK product contains Indena-sourced ingredients. This is not negotiable. <bold>Quality is non-negotiable.</bold>

Products.title: Our Product Line
Products.subtitle: Comprehensive formulations designed for specific health areas, each powered by Indena ingredients

cardio.name: Cardio Naturalis
cardio.description: Supports healthy cholesterol and blood pressure levels

digestum.name: Digestum Complex
digestum.description: Supports healthy digestion and gut function

skin.name: Skin Vitality
skin.description: Supports skin health and radiance from within

reason1.title: Pharmaceutical Expertise
reason1.description: Team of qualified pharmacists with deep knowledge of pharmacokinetics and clinical efficacy. Every formulation is designed to deliver real, measurable results.

reason2.title: Transparent Formulas
reason2.description: Every ingredient listed, every dosage precise. No proprietary blends, no hiding. Complete transparency so healthcare professionals can prescribe with confidence.

reason3.title: European Standards
reason3.description: Sourced from Indena. Manufacturing follows EU pharmaceutical guidelines. Every batch undergoes rigorous testing to meet the highest quality benchmarks.

CTA.description: Whether you're a healthcare professional, distributor, or pharmacy, we're ready to partner with you. Pharmaceutical-grade supplements with scientific integrity.

Footer.description: Pharmaceutical-grade supplements crafted by pharmacists. Indena ingredients. European standards. Scientific integrity.
